title: Projectile motion-horizontal launch off a cliff

content.question: A projectile is launched horizontally off a cliff of known height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> with speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and reaches the ground a time <math alttext="t " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> after being launched. Another identical projectile is launched horizontally off the same cliff with speed <math alttext="2 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. How long does it take the second projectile to reach the ground?

topic.text: 1.5: Vectors and Motion in Two Dimensions

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
